title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry the pancetta in a large skillet until crispy, about 5-7 minutes.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
Drain the pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add the hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and 1 tbsp tikka masala for at least 1 hour.
Grill or bake marinated chicken until cooked through, about 15 minutes.
In a large pan, melt butter and sauté onions until golden.
Add garlic, ginger, and remaining tikka masala, cook for 1 minute.
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 5 more minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Wash and thoroughly dry the romaine lettuce, then chop into bite-sized pieces.
In a large bowl, combine the lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Toss well to ensure all leaves are coated.
Add croutons and half of the Parmesan cheese, toss again.
Transfer to serving plates.
Top with remaining Parmesan, anchovy fillets if using, and black pepper.
Serve immediately with a lemon wedge.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Delicious Mexican-style tacos with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: Brown the ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with 1/4 cup water.
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill each shell with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, and avocado.
Serve with sour cream and salsa on the side.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C) with a pizza stone if available.
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to desired thickness.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border.
Arrange mozzarella and tomato slices on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Remove from oven, top with fresh basil leaves, and serve hot.

title: Chocolate Brownies
summary: Rich, fudgy chocolate brownies that are perfect for dessert or a sweet treat.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a 9x13 inch baking pan.
In a large bowl, mix melted butter and sugar until well combined.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then add vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, whisk together cocoa, flour, salt, and baking powder.
Gradually fold dry ingredients into wet ingredients until just combined.
Stir in chocolate chips if using.
Pour batter into prepared pan and bake for 25-30 minutes.
Let cool completely before cutting into squares.
